about_the_game:
FlavorSpace is an interstellar cooking competition game with deep food simulation. Travel to alien worlds and invent never-before-seen dishes to meet the changing criteria of each challenge. Learn from the judges as you master unfamiliar ingredients, unlock new tools, and ultimately win the most prestigious culinary contest in the known universe!

Why It’s Unique

Food is simulated at pixel scale, in three dimensions. It can be cut, stacked, rotated, cooked, soaked, smashed, and transformed by a variety of sci-fi cooking gadgets. Some substances melt, some burn, and some come with hazards you’ll have to address before serving.

What's the Vibe

  • Synthwave and pixel art
  • Light humor, may contain puns
  • Play your way - difficulty modes include “chill” with no time limit

Features

  • 18 hand-crafted challenges across 4 contests
  • 52 hand-crafted ingredients
  • Endless “Rogue Chef” mode with procedurally generated variations of challenges and ingredients
  • Creative Mode
  • Optional tutorials

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Tested on Ubuntu 18.04.5 LTS, should work with most popular linux distros
  • Processor: 64 bit dual core processor or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0 capable graphics card
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
